english.segment1: You can run but Ill be here waiting. For your return when you get frustrated. Im the only one who loves you without condition
english.segment3: I will, I will be here waiting, waiting. I will, I will be still Ill never change now. I will, I will be here waiting, waiting. I will, I will be still I never tell a lie. Im a rock and you can stand on me. Whenever youre lost Im the road that you need to take. This world is crazy and its not the safest place to be
english.segment5: You can run, but Ill be here waiting. For your return when you get so frustrated
